name: Norton and Mary
description:
This is a game me and my brother designed for the Ludum Dare 37 Jam. The theme was 'One Room'.

Goal: To kill the rat that kidnapped your sister.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Left and Right Arrows: Move

Up Arrow: Jump

Ctrl Key: Attack

C Key: Change camera

R Key: Reset the level

Xbox 360 Controller:

Left Stick: Move

A Button: Jump

X Button: Attack

Y Button: Change Camera

Start Button: Reset the level

Credits:

Polaroid Image: Hugo Humberto Plácido da Silva
